content: moldau socks by caoua coffee materials fingering weight sock yarn 350m/380yds 385m/420yds 430m/470yds sample sweetgeorgia tough love sock 80% wool 20% nylon needles 2 25mm / us1 or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker tapestry needle size adult s m l gauge 36 sts / 44 row= 10cm /4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k = knit stitch k2tog = knit 2 sts together p = purl stitch pyo3k = insert left needle into the front of the yo and pass the yarn over over the last 3 knit stitches thus creating a wrap around the 3 knit stitches that forms a horizontal bar p2tog = purl 2 sts together rs = right side / public side / outside of sock sl yb = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in back back = the side away from you sl yf = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in front front = the side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit both stitches together through the back loops st s = stitch es yo = yarn over ws = wrong side / private side / inside of sock ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved moldau v 1 page 1/5 moldau socks - by caoua coffee before you start some notes on size the barred stitches in these socks don t draw in because the yarn-over is just the perfect length to fit over the 3 knit stitches without strangling them but even though the barred stitches are used in zig-zags and interspersed with plain knitted row the fabric in this pattern is a bit less elastic than regular stockinette keep this in mind when choosing the size you are knitting so you ll be able to get the socks over your heel if in doubt choose the larger size and perhaps work with a smaller needle size or a yarn that gives you a slightly smaller gauge pattern cuff loosely cast on 60 72 84 sts place marker and join to start working in the round work k1 p1 ribbing for 12 15 15 rounds leg start working the leg pattern work the 12 rounds of leg pattern 4 5 5 times i e 48 60 60 leg round all together than work round 1 of leg pattern once more leg pattern round 1 * k3 yo k3 pyo3k repeat from * to end of round round 2 k all stitches round 3 * k2 yo k3 pyo3k k1 repeat from * to end of round round 4 k all sts round 5 * k1 yo k3 pyo3k k2 repeat from * to end of round round 6 k all sts round 7 * yo k3 pyo3k k3 repeat from * to end of round round 8 k all sts round 9 same as round 5 round 10 k all sts round 11 same as round 3 round 12 k all sts set-up for
